name: you

example: 单词 enough 的例句||||There are enough eggs in the kitchen. 厨房有足够的鸡蛋。||||One kilo will be enough. 一公斤就够了。

name: Thailand
example: 单词 Thailand 的例句||||We live on rice in Thailand. 在泰国我们以米为主食。||||We're going to Thailand for our honeymoon. 我们要去泰国度蜜月。

example: 单词 healthy 的例句||||We all want healthy skin. 我们都想要健康的皮肤。||||The air by the sea is pure and healthy. 海边的空气清新又有益健康。

name: USA

example: 单词 page 的例句||||Please turn to page twelve. 请翻到十二页。||||The first page of the book is shown on the screen. 屏幕上映出了这本书的第一页。

example: 单词 great 的例句||||Mozart was a great musician. 莫扎特是伟大的音乐家。||||The elephant is a great animal. 象是巨大的动物。

name: him
example: 单词 him 的例句||||You can see him tomorrow. 你明天可以见他。||||I found him at home. 我发现他在家。

name: speak

example: 单词 really 的例句||||I really have to go. 我确实得走了。||||He's really a paper tiger. 他实际上只是一个纸老虎。

example: 单词 sure 的例句||||I'm sure he wouldn't mind. 我肯定他不会介意。||||I am sure they'll win. 我肯定他们会赢。

example: 单词 ready 的例句||||I am not ready yet. 我还没有准备好。||||We are all ready to listen to you. 我们都准备好听你说。

example: 单词 skirt 的例句||||She washed the skirt yesterday. 她昨天洗了这裙子。||||Mary puts on her skirt. 玛莉穿上她的裙子。

name: wrongly

name: toothache
example: 单词 toothache 的例句||||I've got a terrible toothache. 我的牙痛得厉害。||||When did your toothache start? 你的牙痛从什么时候开始？

name: fun
example: 单词 fun 的例句||||It's fun being a singer. 做一个歌手很有乐趣。||||Just for fun. 只是为了好玩罢了。

name: busy
example: 单词 busy 的例句||||Are you busy tomorrow afternoon? 明天下午你忙吗？||||I am busy these days. 我这些日子很忙。

example: 单词 better 的例句||||I know you better than him. 我了解你胜过了解他。||||She is better at singing. 她更擅长于歌唱。

name: house
example: 单词 house 的例句||||They painted the house themselves. 他们亲自油漆了房屋。||||I passed by your house. 我经过你的家。

name: hungry
interpret: adj.饥饿的，荒年的，渴望的，不毛的
example: 单词 hungry 的例句||||You look very hungry now. 你现在看起来很饿。||||He seemed thin and hungry. 他显得非常消瘦和饥饿。

name: moment
interpret: n.片刻，瞬间，时刻；机会，时机
example: 单词 moment 的例句||||Where were you at that moment? 那个时刻你在哪里？||||It was a really scary moment. 那一刻真是吓人。

name: lovely

example: 单词 lovely 的例句||||Thank you for the lovely dinner. 感谢你美好的晚餐。||||Look at those lovely cabbages. 看那些可爱的卷心菜。

example: 单词 live 的例句||||I live in the north of China. 我居住在中国北部。||||We can not live without water. 没有水我们不能生存。

name: postbox
example: 单词 postbox 的例句||||I dropped the letter into the postbox. 我把信丢在信箱里。||||He stood by the postbox. 他站在邮箱旁边。

name: theirs
interpret: pron.他(她)们的，它们的(名词性)
example: 单词 theirs 的例句||||Our house is white; theirs is brown. 我们的房子是白色的，他们的是棕色的。||||It's a habit of theirs. 这是他们一种习惯。

name: third
example: 单词 third 的例句||||This is your third cup of coffee. 这是你第三杯咖啡了。||||You can take the bus and get off at the third stop. 你可以坐公共汽车第三站下。

example: 单词 worry 的例句||||I have nothing to worry about in this life. 我这一生都很省心。||||Don't worry. 别担心。

name: half

example: 单词 expensive 的例句||||The shirt is much too expensive. 这件衬衫很昂贵。||||This is a very expensive shirt. 这是非常昂贵的衬衫。

name: enjoy
